Title: Severed Head Showcase
Writer: Keegan-Michael Key (creator), Jordan Peele (creator), Rebecca Drysdale, Colton Dunn, Phil Augusta Jackson, Jay Martel, Ian Roberts, Alex Rubens, Charlie Sanders, Rich Talarico
Actors: Keegan-Michael Key, Jordan Peele, Utkarsh Ambudkar, Victor Bell
Plot: A gospel group must practice without their coach, a group of warriors celebrate a beheading, a prisoner tries to trick his guard, and a young man is confronted for only speaking in catchphrases.
